data.name: Laypo Simulator
data.detailed_description:
Laypo Simulator
contains two different Game Modes, Laypo Country Simulator and Laypo Survival Apocalypse


Laypo Survival Apocalypse
Is a game mode where you survive from enemies (at the moment just zombies). You can farm if that is what you want to do. You can also build a base and put down defences to protect your base!.
Animals currently include:
- Chickens: Chickens require to be cared for, this involves refilling water troughs, cleaning their poop and collecting eggs.
Food includes:
- Blue berries and bush berries.
- Currently developing the functions of Orange Trees
Other objects include:
Wells, Walls, doors, chests, Work bench, Furnace.
- Every Night a Magical Gnome appears which you can trade with.
- In depth Growth Stages of plants.

'Laypo Country Simulator' is a game developed by Lewibie.
The goal of the game is to survive as the mayor of a country. .
The current features include:
BE THE MAYOR!!
Be the mayor of your OWN NATION, from looking after the needs of the citizens to politics (coming in the future), transport, relations with other nations etc

Weather

The weather in the game changes on an in-game daily basis, from Storms, flooding rains, sun, clouds. These in game weather features influence others features within the game such as floods, droughts, fires, water storage etc

Water

Dams hold water for your citizens and is influenced by weather and special technologies. Make sure you don't run out of water though as you could lose that way!!

Interests

Each resident have their own interest in sports and animals, make sure you fulfil their needs as that could influence the countries happiness levels.

Wars

At the moment there is only wars with local tribes which only have a 4% chance to happen every day!, Make sure you buy defences so you don't get wiped out!!

A lot more other features are also added such as:
- Fires
- Fire Ratings
- Pets
- Agriculture
- Research
- Tourism
- Diseases
- Emergency Services
- The list goes on!!

data.short_description: 'Laypo Simulator' includes multiple different game modes. At the moment they include: Laypo Country Simulator and Laypo Apocalypse Survival.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7,8,8.1,10 64-bit
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: onboard
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7,8,8.1,10 64-bit
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: onboard
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
